thread.title: BRIEF-Supermicro Sees Q3 2018 Sales $700 Million To $780 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Supermicro Sees Q3 2018 Sales $700 Million To $780 Million
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Super Micro Computer Inc:
* SUPERMICROÂ® ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 PRELIMINARY FINANCIAL INFORMATION; MANAGEMENT CHANGES
* SEES Q3 2018 SALES $700 MILLION TO $780 MILLION * SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.49 TO $0.53 * SEES Q2 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 TO $0.09 * SEES Q2 2018 SALES $840 MILLION TO $850 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.44 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
